sentences.cn: 一家出售手工艺品的商店

sentences.en: About one - eight of us are engaged in handicraft production.
sentences.cn: 我们中间有 八分之一 的人从事手工业生产.

sentences.en: Almost all of the valuable handicraft articles are there.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有有价值的工艺品都集中在哪儿.

sentences.en: At present, Hua Hong handicraft products in the domestic market top.
sentences.cn: 目前, 华鸿工艺品产品在国内市场位居前列.

sentences.en: Her hobbies are music, reading and handicraft.
sentences.cn: 她的爱好是音乐、读书和手工。

sentences.en: It is known for its handicraft products.
sentences.cn: 这地方因出产手工艺品而闻名.

sentences.en: It might be an industrial product or a handicraft commodity.
sentences.cn: 受保护的产品可能是工业产品或者手工业制品.

sentences.en: It's hard to judge between the tow handicraft articles; they're both charming.
sentences.cn: 很难判定这两件工艺品孰优孰劣, 它们都很好看.

sentences.en: Soviet industries, when I visited Red China, were all handicraft.
sentences.cn: 在我访问红色中国的时候,苏区工业都是手工业.

sentences.en: The delicate handicraft works will not bear rough handling.
sentences.cn: 精致的手工艺品经不起粗鲁的摆弄.

sentences.en: The rise of the city is intimately associated with the transition from handicraft to machine industry.
sentences.cn: 城市的兴起是同手工业向机器生产的过渡密切相关的.

sentences.en: These handicraft articles shine as Bright as gold , silver and jewelry.
sentences.cn: 那些工艺品闪耀着金银珠宝般的光彩.

sentences.en: Traditional handicraft industry product of the export of China does not decend 100 kinds.
sentences.cn: 中国出口的传统手工业品不下一百种.

sentences.en: Traditional handicraft techniques are being steadily improved.
sentences.cn: 传统的手工艺技术不断革新.

sentences.en: Why are you silent? What is your handicraft?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不说话? 你的手艺是什么?

trans.tran_cn: 手工艺，手工艺品，手工业者，手工艺人
trans.tran_en: an activity such as sewing or making baskets, in which you use your hands in a skilful way to make things
